format: JavaScript (React testing with Jest and React Testing Library)
description: Test file for the App component of a Tic Tac Toe game, verifying UI rendering, theme switching, and AI move logic.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up fake timers before each test for asynchronous control.

methods.name: afterEach
methods.description: Restores real timers after each test.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual test cases for UI rendering, theme toggling, and AI move logic.
